name: Dark Reconnaissance
Lore: 'On her assignment to kill Sharad Hett, Aurra used her patience and cunning to help track down the Jedi Master.',
Text: 'Deploy on opponent''s location. Your Force drains here cannot be modified or canceled by opponent. Wherever you have two Mistryl, your Force drains are +1. ''Stolen'' on Swilla Corey is treated as ''placed in owner''s Used Pile'' and it may target a weapon instead of a device.',
